name: viz-mcp
description: Interactive visualization and diagram editing MCP server with Excalidraw, Mermaid.js, Chart.js, Plotly, and ECharts support
author: FluidMCP

tools.name: create_diagram
tools.description: Create interactive Excalidraw diagrams for flowcharts, wireframes, and architecture

tools.name: list_diagrams
tools.description: List all saved diagrams with metadata

tools.name: generate_flowchart
tools.description: Generate Mermaid.js flowcharts, sequence diagrams, and more

tools.name: create_chart
tools.description: Create Chart.js visualizations (bar, line, pie, etc.)

tools.name: create_plot
tools.description: Create Plotly advanced plots (3D, heatmap, scatter, etc.)

tools.name: create_dashboard
tools.description: Create ECharts dashboards and complex visualizations

installation: No additional dependencies required - uses CDN-based libraries
usage: Add to your FluidMCP configuration and call visualization tools to create interactive diagrams and charts
